title: Introducing: Alex Burey
body:
Much like [Jimmy Napes](www.

crackintheroad.com/music/30599-new-jimmy-napes-give), **Alex Burey** is a name that seems to have been drifting around for a eternity, and now he’s coming good on early suggested potential. His first two offering, Inside World and Unspoken combine the elegance of Beach House with the composure and lyricism of a 60’s crooner, poignant and gorgeously textured. His latest track, The Intimidator, the lead released from his forthcoming EP, **_Inside World_**, out 9 Feb, is a more psychedelic journey, whilst maintaining the Scott Walker vibes of his early work.

His first two offering, Inside World and Unspoken combine the elegance of Beach House with the composure and lyricism of a 60’s crooner, poignant and gorgeously textured. \[…\]
